level.heading: SULFUR CONTENT OF FUEL OILS (ยง 20-801)

level.text: The purchase, sale, offer for sale, storage, transport, or the use of, fuel oil which contains more than one percent (1%) sulfur by weight in the District is prohibited, if the fuel oil is to be burned in the District.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Section 3 of the District of Columbia Air Pollution Control Act of 1984, D.C. Law 5-165, ยง 801, 32 DCR 565.644 (February 1, 1985).
